venue.address_1: Between State Rd and Center Hill Rd
venue.name: Center Hill Bog

item.description:
We'll gather bogside around 5:20 a.m. for sunrise pictures and a short speech by CPC chairman Bill Keohan about the unique role this bog will play in the care and maintenance of Plymouth's open space.

Then by 5:45 we'll saunter over to a nearby home for pancakes plus.

The bog can be reached from State Rd. (3A) by a dirt road that comes right off that road, heading east, or ifÂ  you park near or at the cook's house - at 201 Center Hill Road. Look a the map for the specific location of the bog. (photo: Frank Mand)
item.how_to_find_us: A town-owned bog between rte 3a and Center Hill Road, Plymouth

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: "Sunrise (and breakfast) by the Bog"
